item.title: Introduction
item.description: Consider a simple linear regression problem where it is desired to estimate a set of parameters using a least squares criterion. We generate some synthetic data where we know the model completely, that is \[ Y = X\beta + \epsilon \] where \(Y\) is a \(100\times 1\) vector, \(X\) is a \(100\times 10\) matrix, \(\beta = -4,\ldots ,-1, 0, 1, \ldots 5\) is a \(10\times 1\) vector, and \(\epsilon \sim N(0, 1).
